name: Sinister Castle
description:
I worked pretty hard on this- it's my first fully completed scratch game!

Story: the evil version of yourself (dark knight) crossed over from a parallel world, and is wreaking havoc. you must stop him

It does take a sec to load

Also, reload page to play again

-CONTROLS-
-Click to shoot
-WASD or arrow keys to move
-mouse to aim
-press 1 for sword
-press 2 for knife
-press 3 for hammer (hold mouse to use correctly)
